name: Suspicious Tea-Smoked Squab
desc: A very popular dish. The char on the squab's legs and wings show a lack of control over the heat, but with a bit of patience, you might just about get it in your mouth.

value.text: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

customize.name: Recipe: Tea-Smoked Squab
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tea-Smoked Squab.

customize.name: Chenyu Adeptea
customize.desc: Tea grown in warm, moist areas in Chenyu Vale. After millennia of careful cultivation, the tea today emits a rich fragrance that can be savored from several streets away.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Tea-Smoked Squab
customize.desc: A very popular dish. Squab is marinated in tea and sauce overnight before being dried and deep-fried, suffusing the meat with the wonderful aroma of tea. This technique has been passed down for many years and is a banquet delicacy.

customize.name: Delicious Tea-Smoked Squab
customize.desc: A very popular dish. The translucent squab skin is crispy and thin as a sheet of ochre paper, and the meat is firm and plump. Accompanied by delicate gravy, this dish will capture hearts and stomachs alike.
